item.description:
Howdy folks,

A bunch of folks asked if I would be willing to do a skills clinic like I did last year, and I caved after enough peer pressure. This is the only time this year that I will be doing this, so don't miss out!

Details:

We're going to be going through the following lessons and drills:

  1. Backhand throw lesson & practice
  2. Forehand throw lesson & practice
  3. Field awareness lesson
  4. Basic cutting lesson (beginner) & dump cutting lesson (intermediate)
  5. End-zone drill (beginner) & 3-man drill (intermediate)

The lessons and drills will last an hour and half and discs/cones will be provided. All you need to do is bring your body. (Hey... sometimes I leave it at home, okay! )

See you on the field!

Joe

P.S. As always, the event is free.
item.how_to_find_us: Come to the softball fields... the softball field lights should be on and you will see people tossing the disc.
item.name: Frisbee Skillz Clinic
